attributes.action: Give advanced information to GCSE and A-levels for 2023
attributes.additional_details: This should go ahead as the students have suffered from the Industrial Action (NEU) taking place where they have had no lessons and missed out on key content. Also, COVID-19 has affected both year groups as they might have had to self-isolate or teachers being absent. For the year 13s, it is their first formal exam as they didn't do GCSEs properly in 2021. It would be very unfair as these students would be at a disadvantage.
attributes.background: Give advanced information for the current year 11 and 13s for their GCSEs and A-levels

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632547
